descriptionHtml:
Stephania is a level 15 lightning mage that will level up with you. She can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. She is essential and can be married.

Mods used

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 MAIN FILE

Amazing Smooth Females Complete by Zalzama http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/140
SMOOTHER FEMALE FACES ONLY

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
STANDALONE ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_2  FILE
author: mylittleduck
